V sebi je prebudila zmagovalko
Vodilo menedžerke Tanje Skaza je, da si prav vse v življenju krojimo sami.
04 Nov 2019, 12:23 by A. K.



Tanja Skaza z Izo Login FOTO: BARBARA REYA



Za dobro energijo je poskrbela tudi Nina Pušlar. FOTO: MIRAN JURŠIČ


Poslovna ženska, menedžerka in motivatorka Tanja Skaza je pred dnevi predstavila svojo knjigo z naslovom Spremembe vredna. »Ko sem spremenila sebe, se je spremenila organizacija. Ko sem si dovolila poslušati srce, so zaposleni delali z intuicijo.
Ko sem spremenila sebe, se je spremenila organizacija.


Za dobro energijo je poskrbela tudi Nina Pušlar. FOTO: MIRAN JURŠIČ

Knjiga je resnična izpoved moje poslovne poti, skozi katero sem tudi osebnostno rasla. Je iskren zapis o tem, kaj sem delala dobro in kaj ne. Kako sem se soočila z izzivi in jih sprejela kot moje učenje, da sem danes tukaj, kjer sem. Želim, da s knjigo pomagam marsikateremu posamezniku, da se odloči živeti svoje sanje in prebudi zmagovalca v sebi. Še vedno pa želim ostati poslovna uspešna ženska, saj samo z rezultati in pravimi primeri iz prakse lahko zaposlenim pokažeš, da se da. Vse se da,« je ob premierni predstavitvi knjige povedala Tanja Skaza, ki je brez dlake na jeziku predstavila svojo poslovno in osebno pot – z vodilno mislijo, da je vse mogoče.

She awakened within herself the winner
The manager of Tanja Skaz's manager is that we make up everything in our lives.
04 Nov 2019, 12:23 by A.K.



Tanja Skaza with Izo Login PHOTO: BARBARA REYA



Nina Pušlar also provided good energy. PHOTO: MIRAN JURŠIČ


Businesswoman, manager and motivator Tanja Skaza presented her book, Changes Worthwhile, a few days ago. “When I changed myself, the organization changed. When I allowed myself to listen to my heart, the employees worked with intuition.
When I changed myself, the organization changed.


Nina Pušlar also provided good energy. PHOTO: MIRAN JURŠIČ

The book is a true testament to my business journey through which I have grown personally. It is an honest record of what I did well and what didn't. How I faced the challenges and accepted them as my teaching to be where I am today. I want to help many individuals with the book decide to live their dreams and awaken the winner within themselves. Still, I want to remain a successful business woman, because only with the results and the right practice examples can you show your employees that they can. Everything is possible, "said Tanja Skaza at the book's premiere, which presented her business and personal path without a hair on her tongue - with the leading idea that anything is possible.
